node.detail_zh: 男患者為第 #52 宗個案患者的兒子，過往健康良好，居於香海大廈。他於 2 月 8 日出現發燒，2 月 9 日向私家醫生求診， 2 月 12 日到律敦治醫院求醫並入院接受治療。其呼吸道樣本證實對新型冠狀病毒呈陽性反應，現時情況穩定。患者在潛伏期內沒有外遊。
node.detail_en: The male patient is the son of the 52th case, has good past health and lives at Heung Hoi Mansion. He developed fever on Feb 8 and consulted a private doctor on Feb 9. He sought treatment from Ruttonjee Hospital on Feb 12 and was admitted for treatment. His respiratory sample was tested positive for novel coronavirus and he is now in a stable condition. The patient had no travel history during the incubation period.
node.classification_zh: 可能本地個案的密切接觸者

groups.description_zh: 有居於 A07 室住戶先後確診，懷疑病毒經損毀的排污渠管系統傳播。衞生署一度撤離大廈 A07 室住戶接受隔離。食環署消毒涉及單位及房署檢查單位喉管後，居民獲安排返回居所。
groups.description_en: Some residents of the flats A07 across various floors of Hong Mei House (C H Estate, Tsing Yi) were diagnosed, hence leading to to suspicion of sewer leakage. Over a hundred residents of flats A07 were transferred to quarantine centre(s?). Residents were allowed to return home after FEHD sterilized the flats in question and confirmed that the sewer system is intact.
